description:
In this Masterclass on the British Royal Family Glorija Lawrence, a professional Astrologer for 30 years, delves back one hundred years or so to see how closely aligned the Astrology charts and the reality of the life really are, and we look forward to the next hundred years and have a look at what might be in store for the British Royal Family and the best know monarchy in the world.

Join Glorija in finding some fascinating patterns running through generations of one family. One of these patterns enabled Glorija to predict the recent birth of Prince George to within 4 hours, despite the fact he arrived 10 days late!
title: Astrology - Masterclass on the British Royal Family
